WHO'S WHO

Shri.Aditya P.Padhi
Chief Secretary, Odisha

Government of Odisha is taking all measures to establish the last mile connectivity to ensure Governance at door step. I am confident that people of Odisha can avail hassle-free public service at Common Service Centres in their villages / panchayats through the Common Application Portal

Shri R.Balkrishnan
IAS Addl.Chief Secretary-cum-DC, Odisha

It’s a pleasure on my part to know that Government of Odisha has initiated steps to deliver all the Public Services through a Common Application Portal at Common Service Centres, which can ensure service delivery in a much easy and faster way.

Shri. Ashok K. Meena
IAS, Special Secretary, General Administration Department, Odisha

Government of Odisha is taking all measures to establish the last mile connectivity to ensure Governance at door step. I am confident that people of Odisha can avail hassle-free public service at Common Service Centres in their villages / panchayats through the Common Application Portal

Shri. R.S.Gopalan, IAS
Addl.Secretary, General Administration Department-cum-Executive Director, CMGI

The Government under the Administrative Reforms Initiative is keen to establish a hassle-free Public Service Delivery System. This workshop on Government Process Re-engineering will take forward the system to operate in a faster way which can to avail smooth public service delivery.
